1YearAnniversaryPortrait.name: 1 Year Anniversary Portrait
1YearAnniversaryPortrait.description: Thank you for joining us during the celebration of Heroes of the Storm's first anniversary. To many more years to come! Oh, and don't forget to grab a slice of cake!

2016FallGlobalChampionshipPortrait.name: 2016 Fall Global Championship Portrait
2016FallGlobalChampionshipPortrait.description: Thank you for watching the live stream of the 2016 Fall Global Championship. Please accept this portrait as a token of our appreciation!
2016FallGlobalChampionshipPortrait.descriptionUnearned: Thank you for watching the live stream of the 2016 Fall Global Championship. Please accept this portrait as a token of our appreciation!

2017Season1TeamLeaguePortraitGold.name: 2017 S1 Team League Portrait
2017Season1TeamLeaguePortraitGold.description: Congratulations! By reaching Gold in Team League Season 1 of 2017, you earned this 2017 S1 Team League Portrait!
